title: ICE: "type parameter out of range when substituting" when accessing non-existent field of struct

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-nightly
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to nightly.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust fn main() { let x = String::new(); x.y; } ``` This doesn't work for all structs, for example using `Vec` produces a normal compiler error. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.51.0-nightly (d4e3570db 2021-02-01) binary: rustc commit-hash: d4e3570db4c007089035b833cc20c7fc2f8cb32f commit-date: 2021-02-01 host: x86_64-pc-windows-gnu release: 1.51.0-nightly LLVM version: 11.0.1 ``` Couldn't reproduce this on 1.49.0 or 1.50.0-beta.8. ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: compiler\rustc_middle\src\ty\subst.rs:529:17: type parameter `T/#0` (T/0) out of range when substituting, substs=[] ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/d4e3570db4c007089035b833cc20c7fc2f8cb32f\compiler\rustc_errors\src\lib.rs:904:9 stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic 1: rustc_errors::HandlerInner::span_bug 2: rustc_errors::Handler::span_bug 3: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt::{{closure}} 4: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt 5: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt 6: rustc_middle::util::bug::span_bug_fmt 7: ::fold_ty 8: rustc_middle::ty::fold::TypeFoldable::fold_with 9: rustc_middle::ty::structural_impls::::super_fold_with 10: rustc_middle::ty::FieldDef::ty 11: rustc_typeck::check::expr::::check_for_nested_field 12: rustc_typeck::check::expr::::check_for_nested_field 13: rustc_typeck::check::expr::::check_field 14: rustc_typeck::check::expr::::check_expr_kind 15: rustc_typeck::check::expr::::check_expr_with_expectation 16: rustc_typeck::check::fn_ctxt::checks::::check_stmt 17: rustc_typeck::check::fn_ctxt::checks::::check_block_with_expected 18: rustc_typeck::check::expr::::check_expr_kind 19: rustc_typeck::check::expr::::check_expr_with_expectation 20: rustc_typeck::check::expr::::check_return_expr 21: rustc_typeck::check::check::check_fn 22: rustc_infer::infer::InferCtxtBuilder::enter 23: rustc_typeck::check::typeck 24: rustc_middle::ty::query:: for rustc_middle::ty::query::queries::typeck>::compute 25: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 26: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 27: rustc_middle::ty::query::plumbing::::start_query::{{closure}}::{{closure}}::{{closure}} 28: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 29: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 30: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::ensure_query_impl 31: rustc_typeck::check::typeck_item_bodies 32: rustc_middle::ty::query:: for rustc_middle::ty::query::queries::typeck_item_bodies>::compute 33: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 34: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 35: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 36: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 37: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 38: rustc_typeck::check_crate 39: rustc_interface::passes::analysis 40: rustc_middle::ty::query:: for rustc_middle::ty::query::queries::analysis>::compute 41: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 42: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 43: rustc_middle::ty::query::plumbing::::start_query::{{closure}}::{{closure}}::{{closure}} 44: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 45: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 46: rustc_interface::passes::QueryContext::enter 47: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 48: rustc_span::with_source_map 49: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run ```
